data.description: Charming 4 BR / 3 BA Split Foyer design to capture the beauty of this iconic location. Freshly painted, updated bathrooms, kitchen & a new deck. This home offers a second kitchen downstairs, Family room, bedroom, bathroom & storage area. Quiet cul-de-sac. Make your appointment to see it today! Your dream home awaits!!
